text: Hē mōminaharū! Svayaṁ āphūlā'ī ra āphnā gharavālāharūlā'ī tyasa āgōbāṭa bacā'ū, jasakō īndhana munaṣya ra pat'thara hunēchan, jasakō lāgi kaṭhōra svabhāvakā, yastā balaśālī phariśtāharū niyukta hunēchan jasalē tyasamā allāhakō avajñā gardainan baru jē ādēśa pani di'incha, tyasalā'ī kāryānvita gardachan
